document_data.name: Seven Traders
document_data.mainbody: The '''Seven Traders''' were traders in [[Marsember]] as of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: After the spring of the {{yearlinkName|1373}}, when trying to gain access to lady [[Joysil Ambrur]], the bard and [[Harper]] [[Roldro Tattershar]] threatened [[Elward Daunthideir]], the steward of [[Haelithtorntowers]], her residence, with revealing the steward's involvement in the dispute between the seven traders and the tax takers of the [[Marsember]] port a season prior.
